prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was deposited on [1963 December 17] 1965 November 11.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In this collection of correspondence, Walter Hines Page discusses the comedies of Charles Leonard Moore, an article by W. H. Kirkbride, and sends letters of appreciation and regret.
The correspondents include Richard Watson Gilder, Charles Leonard Moore, Miss Singleton, and Stewart Edward White.

did.unittitle: Walter Hines Page to Charles Leonard Moore 1895 Nov 9

scopecontent.p: Refers to Moore's comedies. Says an answer will be sent in 4 or 5 days.

did.unittitle: W. H. P. to Richard Watson Gilder 1906 Jan 31

scopecontent.p: Suggests writing to W. H. Kirkbride about the article on the old man and his one acre.

did.unittitle: W. H. P. to Stewart Edward White 1913 Apr 23
W. H. P. to Miss Singleton 1913 May 17

scopecontent.p: Appreciates her letter of good wishes.

did.unittitle: W. H. P. to Stewart Edward White 1914 Jan 5

scopecontent.p: Regrets that he missed seeing S. E. W.
